description:
IOC focuses on UNFCCC COP 25, taking place in Chile in December 2019. This course and F&ES 590 are coordinated, and both are required in order to apply for F&ES funding and Yale badges. Both courses focus on being prepared to get the most out of the trip. Dates:Â Sept 4, Oct 21 & 28, Nov 11 & 18
Prerequisite: F&ES 840 is strongly recommended.
